General.Name: Superior Mining International Corp
General.Description: Superior Mining International Corporation engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. The company was formerly known as Superior Mining Corporation and changed its name to Superior Mining International Corporation in May 2006. Superior Mining International Corporation was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 580 Hornby Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3B6

1.Name: Mr. Cyrus H. Driver CPA, CA
